snippet: Starboard Value, a fund that took aim at Yahoo, has found another target for its activism.
abstract: New York hedge fund Starboard Value says it will engage in proxy fight to gain seats on board of specialty drugmaker DepoMed, saying it owns 9.8 percent of company

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Starboard Value, a fund that took aim at Yahoo, has found another target for its activism.

headline.main: Starboard Sets Sights on Board Seats at DepoMed
headline.print_headline: Starboard  Sets Sights  on Seats at DepoMed
